data.eml:eml: Remarks on the genus Metacosma Kuznetzov, 1985 (Lepidoptera: Tortricidae, Olethreutinae, Eucosmini), with description of a new species from Japan and Korea

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Komai, Furumi, Byun, Bong-Kyu, Yamazaki, Saburo (2018): Remarks on the genus Metacosma Kuznetzov, 1985 (Lepidoptera: Tortricidae, Olethreutinae, Eucosmini), with description of a new species from Japan and Korea. Zootaxa 4527 (1): 131-139, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4527.1.11
